name: Bram Broccoli
riddle_hint: I am green and look like a little tree. Find me where the fresh veggies decree!
product_information: Broccoli is a superfood packed with vitamins C and K, fiber, and antioxidants.
food_waste_tip: Don't discard the stalk! Slice it thinly for stir-fries, or shred it for coleslaw. Broccoli leaves are edible too!

name: Karel Kip
riddle_hint: I say 'tok tok tok' and give you an egg, look for me where it's chilly, I beg!
product_information: Chicken is a great source of lean protein, essential for muscle growth and repair.
food_waste_tip: Use leftover cooked chicken in salads, sandwiches, or soups. Chicken bones can be used to make a nutritious stock.

name: Bella Banaan
riddle_hint: I'm a curved yellow fruit, a monkey's delight. Find me for a potassium bite!
product_information: Bananas are a fantastic source of potassium, vitamin B6, and vitamin C.
food_waste_tip: Overripe bananas are perfect for smoothies, banana bread, or pancakes. You can also freeze them for later use.

name: Melvin Muffin
riddle_hint: Sweet or savory, I come in a paper cup. Fresh from the oven, I'm good to sup!
product_information: Muffins can be a tasty treat or a quick breakfast. Look for whole-grain options for more fiber.
food_waste_tip: Stale muffins can be revived by lightly sprinkling with water and warming in the oven, or turn them into bread pudding.

name: Yola Yoghurt
riddle_hint: I'm cool and creamy, good for your tum. Find me with the milk, before I become glum!
product_information: Yoghurt is a good source of calcium, protein, and probiotics which are beneficial for gut health.
food_waste_tip: If your yoghurt is close to its expiry date, freeze it in ice cube trays for smoothies or make frozen yoghurt bites.
